title: Queen Bee branding icon + favicon swap (static assets)

requirements.summary: Replace the header inline SVG brand mark with the provided Queen Bee logo PNG at the same 64x64 size and unchanged header spacing.
acceptanceCriteria: The header icon is rendered from a PNG asset (not the inline SVG) and remains 64x64.
The header text layout and spacing remain unchanged (no visual jump/shift).
The icon has appropriate alt text in English (e.g., "Queen Bee Guitar Repair logo").

file_operations.description: Replace the inline that loads the static PNG asset from frontend/public/assets/generated/queen-bee-app-icon.dim_180x180.png, keeping the container and layout classes so the rendered size remains 64x64 (h-16 w-16) and spacing is unchanged; include English alt text (e.g., "Queen Bee Guitar Repair logo").

requirements.summary: Add and wire favicon assets derived from the logo so the browser tab icon reflects the updated branding.
acceptanceCriteria: At least one favicon link is present in frontend/index.html pointing to a generated favicon PNG in frontend/public/assets/generated/.
After rebuild, the favicon shown in the browser tab matches the attached logo artwork.

file_operations.description: Add favicon <link> tags in <head> referencing the generated static assets frontend/public/assets/generated/queen-bee-favicon.dim_32x32.png and frontend/public/assets/generated/queen-bee-favicon.dim_48x48.png so the browser tab/favicon uses the updated Queen Bee mark.

requirements.summary: Store generated branding images under frontend/public/assets/generated and reference them directly from the frontend UI (no backend image serving).
acceptanceCriteria: All new/updated images are present under frontend/public/assets/generated.
The header icon and favicon load from static file paths in the built frontend.

file_operations.description: Add the generated 32x32 square favicon PNG derived from the attached crowned bee artwork at this exact path so it can be referenced statically by frontend/index.html.
Add the generated 48x48 square favicon PNG derived from the attached crowned bee artwork at this exact path so it can be referenced statically by frontend/index.html.
Add the generated 180x180 square app icon PNG derived from the attached crowned bee artwork at this exact path so it can be referenced statically by the header UI.

Add the updated/generated 512x512 square logo PNG (centered, clean crop of the attached crowned bee mark) at this exact path to ensure all branding images live under frontend/public/assets/generated as static assets.
